Text: Loocks like noone wants the HT release anymore so why should i grab that in the future :-) just give me a hint if any of you not eagrease whith me :-)  Cheerz
Great update,as for HT not my fave,but then all depend on the model in the shoot.Anyhow thanks for asking.
Thanks for a vid with Princess Donna - haven't seen her in a while (outside PublicDisgrace).

Ill DL anything kink, but HT are not my favs. Thanks for all your hard work :)
My preferred order would be: EB, WA, PD, DevineB, WP, DB, TTOO, HT, FM, US.

Also, I,myself, quite like HT, except the short, episodic scene break-down vids (both on HT and DB) with Matt Williams that are very frustrating to collect and take space with the duplicate pre- and post-consent talks. If nobody feels different about them, you might skip those - they deliver far less bang for the same amount of work on your part. Also, a finer point: while i don't like the short vids with Matt Williams, I do enjoy the shorts with Lochai (who also works on both HT and DB), because I like the down-to-the bones approach and not needing to see which scene fits next. Ok, long and convoluted message, but I hope my point gets through.

Thanks Merzedes. Nice work! 

HT and DB have both gone way down hill in quality and length. I wouldn't bother with those anymore either.
Ok in the future i will upload HT- only if i got a requste   :-)  Cheerz

Thanks Merzedes,

I'm a bit like mafiadog, depends on the model for me if i will download it or not.
Doesn't even depend on the model, it depends on the shoot. That last one with Lilla Katt was incredible, but HogTied is mostly pretty lame.
